creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hair pin; pin end is very long, square and narrow; pin is twisted near the decorative top; decorative top has ten circular medallions with faces, possibly water buffalo faces on them; medallions are in two horizontal rows of four with one medallion in between the rows on each end; pin fits through plaque (piece b)
object_name: Hair pin with pin and plaque
title: Hair pin with pin and plaque
